SELECT ID as Hotel_Booking_ID, Itinerary_Number, Room_Number_Assignment, Res_Status_Type, External_System_RefID, Profile_ID, 
	Arrival_Date, Departure_Date , Room_Type_Code, Room_Type_Name
FROM Hotel_Booking 
WHERE Res_Status_Type NOT IN(2, 7) AND Room_Number_Assignment IN ('3212','1002','2106','6011','4109','444-1, 444-2','C465','C256','C253','B404','172','C475','421-1','291','397','573','440-1, 440-2','111-1, 111-2','154-2','145','103','103','109','111','112','113','114','115','118','120','122','123','125','126','130','131','132','133','134','135','136','137','138','141','141','142','144','145','146','147','148','148','149','150','151','151','152','153','154','155','158','161','163','165','167','169','171','172','173','174','203','205','206','209','213','213','214','216','217','218','220','221','223','223','225','226','227','227','228','230','231','233','234','235','236','236','238','239','240','241','245','245','246','248','249','250','251','252','253','254','256','258','259','260','263','264','265','267','277','278','279','280','282','283','284','287','288','289','290','291','292','293','294','295','296','297','298','298','299','301','301','303','309','315','316','317','318','320','321','323','324','325','326','328','330','331','333','335','337','339','340','341','342','345','347','349','353','354','355','356','357','358','359','360','362','364','365','366','370','372','373','375','376','377','379','380','381','382','385','386','387','387','388','389','391','391','392','393','394','396','397','397','398','403','405','405','411','413','415','416','418','419','421','422','423','424','425','427','428','435','439','443','444','449','452','456','462','465','466','467','471','477','478','480','481','482','483','484','486','488','489','490','491','491','492','492','495','496','496','497','498','499','503','505','506','508','510','515','517','526','527','529','530','535','536','537','537','538','540','543','544','546','547','550','553','554','555','556','557','558','559','560','561','562','563','564','564','566','567','568','569','572','573','575','577','579','580','582','583','587','589','590','591','592','593','594','597','598','601','603','605','608','610','611','612','613','614','615','620','623','625','626','628','630','632','635','635','636','638','642','643','644','645','647','648','652','654','658','661','662','663','664','665','666','668','669','670','671','672','673','675','677','679','681','682','683','684','685','686','688','690','692','695','696','697','698','2101','2108','2109','2110','3101','3103','3105','3106','3108','4101','4102','4104','4111','5100','5100','5101','5102','5108','5111','5112','6101','6106','6107','6109','6112','6113','161','218','B127','3205','3114','2207','4006','583','105','462-1','107-1','209-1, 209-2','316','317','408-1, 408-2','511','389','235','237','6A.4.412','6A.1.104','218','V222','S433','S122','V012','V017','285','204','587','373-1','373-2','6B.5.5525','6201','5009','3201','4005','1203','2111','4203','6206','6211','282','501','3108')
